sentences.en: And the 37 - inch high horse is more than happy to help her playmate.
sentences.cn: 而37英寸高的小马戴西也非常乐意帮助自己的玩伴.

sentences.en: As he had grown from boy to man , he had grown in love with his playmate.
sentences.cn: 随着他从孩子长大成人, 他也把爱情给予了童年时代青梅竹马的同伴.

sentences.en: He wandered hither and thither looking for a playmate.
He was my playmate in childhood.
He was my playmate when I was a child.
sentences.cn: 他是我儿时的游戏伙伴.

sentences.en: His chief playmate was his dog.
sentences.cn: 他的主要玩伴是他的狗.

sentences.en: How lightly she dismisses her old playmate's troubles.
sentences.cn: 她多么轻易地就把她从前游伴的苦恼给撇开啦.

sentences.en: Music has been my playmate, my lover, and my crying towel.
sentences.cn: 音乐一直是我的玩伴, 我的情侣, 我拭泪的毛巾.

sentences.en: Or get playful. Tickle, laugh, be silly. Rediscover the playmate in your partner.
sentences.cn: 开玩笑, 呵痒, 大笑, 装傻. 重新地去发现在你们之间的新的玩伴.

sentences.en: She knew I was the mother of her playmate Tristan.
sentences.cn: 她知道我是玩伴特里思坦的妈妈.

sentences.en: The lyrics tell a bitter - sweet story of the dragon Puffhis playmate Paper, a little boy.
sentences.cn: 它的歌词描写了一头叫做波夫的龙和其小男孩玩伴杰克·派波之间的甜蜜而又痛苦的故事.

sentences.en: The young girl loved to play with her playmates.
sentences.cn: 这个小女孩喜欢和她的玩伴们一起玩。

sentences.en: Tom is my playmate in my childhood.

trans.tran_cn: 一起玩耍的朋友，游戏的伙伴
trans.tran_en: a friend that a child plays with
